name: Woman Life Freedom / Zan Zendegi Azadi
name_original: Woman Life Freedom / Zan Zendegi Azadi
description:
Made for the Woman Life Freedom Jam in less than three days.

For jam hosts: I believe this game complies with the rules, as it does not knowingly encourage any illegal activity or harassment.

__________________________________________________________

Story

You are an Iranian gopnik named Muhammad who decided to join an anti-government protest.

You are so strong and powerful that the Iranian government called the Crawford County Police Department and the Russian Military to help them.

Controls:

Left Ctrl: Fire (Shoot 9mm's)
Arrows: move / navigate menu
Enter/Return: accept menu
